long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Targets the Twilio dashboard (at https://flex.twilio.com/agent-desktop/) and makes a cute little noise whenever a task (or any other HTML node for that matter) shows up in the left pane. If you notice something that probably shouldn't be happening, send me a message at ceichman7@gmail.com and I'll see what I can do. Cheers!!
